name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Night XML - dark mode XML viewer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Night XML enables dark mode on all XML web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Night XML enables dark mode on all XML web pages.
A lightweight and free Chrome Extension that enables dark mode for XML web pages.


FREE FOREVER
Night XML is completely FREE extension that is developed by the team behind one of the
best dark mode extensions - Night Eye
More details can be found at http://nighteye.app


WE CARE ABOUT PRIVACY
Instead of simply pointing you to our privacy policy. We would like to address this topic in
the most understandable language here.
This extension is serverless - no requests are being made. The only data it collects and
stores locally (on your computer) is what type of font have you chosen and the preferred
source code view.


FOLLOW US:
Facebook - https://facebook.com/night.eye.extension/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/nighteye_ext
Pinterest - https://pinterest.com/nighteyeextension/
